article_text:
Jerry Brown may be the luckiest Governor in America. After soaking the rich, Mr. Brown rode the tech industry boom to a budget surplus and blew out spending while preaching fiscal discipline. The self-styled deficit slayer has set California up for another tax hike—and maybe another budget crash.

Mr. Brown’s revised budget this year forecasts $1.9 billion in lower tax revenues than he projected a mere five months ago due to slowing economic growth. Despite boasting budget surpluses for the past three years, Mr. Brown...

article_summary:
Despite boasting budget surpluses for the past three years, Mr. Brown...
After soaking the rich, Mr. Brown rode the tech industry boom to a budget surplus and blew out spending while preaching fiscal discipline.
Mr. Brown’s revised budget this year forecasts $1.9 billion in lower tax revenues than he projected a mere five months ago due to slowing economic growth.
The self-styled deficit slayer has set California up for another tax hike—and maybe another budget crash.
Jerry Brown may be the luckiest Governor in America.
